name: Crazy Wild Crocodile Sim Hunter
description: Crazy Wild Crocodile Sim Hunter is on the rampage and is in an attacking mode, this ravenous giant angry crocodile lurches upon its frantic prey, coming out from the deep dark waters, swimming, crouching, targeting its prey, the attack is immense and deadly with razor sharp teeth and powerful jaws, chew and chomp the flesh of your prey. Swim silently to the seashore and emerge suddenly from the sea waters, crawl your way onto the shore of the crazy beach, hunt and keep frightening the unaware humans and animals equally.
